entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:37 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 12:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
